Instrument.name: Lunar Orbiter Laser Altimeter
Instrument.description: The Lunar Orbiter Laser Altimeter (LOLA) will be used to produce a high-resolution (1 meter vertical resolution, 50 meter horizontal resolution) global topographic map and geodetic framework that enables precise targeting, safe landing, and surface mobility to carry out exploratory activities. It will also be used to detect surface ice inside permanently shadowed craters near the poles.
